property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {INVASION}-Fire RexStars that costs 4 or more (When one of your Fire RexStars that costs 4 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, during your opponent's next turn, your opponent can only put one creature. ■ When this card leaves, untap the creature under it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone tapped. Then put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.
